| HistoryText             = 

The Wildboys consists of two troublesome street dwellers, who enjoy breaking the law in anyway from stealing to general destruction and vandalism. The pair are highly skilled street brawlers, they are expert with knives and other such weapons.

The [[Horsemen of Apocalypse]] attack [[Manhattan]] during the events of the [[Fall of the Mutants]] and cause a city wide blackout,. A Vietnam veteran called [[Ammo (Earth-616)|Ammo]] put together a gang which included the Wildboys who worked together to loot the city.  

A short time later Typhoid Mary recruited the Wildboys along with Ammo, [[Buck Cashman (Earth-616)|Bullet]], and [[Carl Burbank (Earth-616)|Bushwacker]] to fight [[Matthew Murdock (Earth-616)|Daredevil]]. The team beat Daredevil so badly in the attack that they nearly killed him.
